Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI

Class GameViewController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI.GUIController
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI.GameViewController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class GameViewController extends GUIController implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for the GUI when a user is in a game

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method initializes the Game Scene
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - the location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
      resourceBundle - the resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.

    • drawBookshelf

      public void drawBookshelf(Map<Coordinates,ItemTile> tilesMap, String playerUsername, int order)
      Draws a player's personalBookshelf
      Parameters:
      tilesMap - map of the tiles present in the bookshelf (coordinates is the key, tile is the value)
      playerUsername - username of the bookshelf's owner
      order - order of turn for positioning correctly the bookshelf

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method called as a callback function on the click of the sendMessage button It takes the recipient on the selected value on the chatRecipientSelector ComboBox (empty means everyone) The content of the message is the value contained in the textFieldChat
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - click event

    • drawChat

      public void drawChat(List<String> outputMessages)
      Draws the game chat
      Parameters:
      outputMessages - list of all the messages in the chat

    • drawLivingRoom

      public void drawLivingRoom(Map<Coordinates,ItemTile> livingRoomMap)
      Draws the livingRoom Board
      Parameters:
      livingRoomMap - map of the tiles present on the board (coordinates is the key, tile is the value)

    • drawPlayerInTurn

      public void drawPlayerInTurn(String userInTurn, String thisUser)
      Displays a new player in turn
      Parameters:
      userInTurn - username of the player in turn
      thisUser - username of the local player

    • clickCommon2

      public void clickCommon2(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      This click on the second common card opens/closes the popup that gives details about that specific card.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - click event

    • onClickPersonalBookshelf

      public void onClickPersonalBookshelf(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Callback function called when a player clicks on their personalBookshelf. If it's this player's turn and some tiles are selected on the board it will try to insert those tiles inside the personalBookshelf
      Parameters:
      event - click event

    • drawLeaderboard

      public void drawLeaderboard(Map<String,Integer> playerPoints)
      Draws the updated leaderboard
      Parameters:
      playerPoints - map with the username of the players as the key and the points as value

    • drawScoringTokens

      public void drawScoringTokens(Map<String,ArrayList<ScoringToken>> playerScoringTokens)
      Draws the scoring tokens owned by each player
      Parameters:
      playerScoringTokens - map with the username of the player as key, a list of the token owned as value

    • drawWinnerLeaderboard

      public void drawWinnerLeaderboard(String winner, Map<String,Integer> playerPoints)
      Draws the final leaderboard (after the end of the game)
      Parameters:
      winner - username of the winner
      playerPoints - map with the username of the players as key, the final score as value

    • freezeGame

      public void freezeGame()
